graphs.query: dataSource.vendor='Microsoft' dataSource.category='security' | group count() by timestamp=timebucket('1h')
graphs.title: Security Events Over Time

graphs.query: dataSource.vendor='Microsoft' dataSource.category='security' | group count = count() by event.type | sort - count
graphs.title: Events by Type

graphs.query: dataSource.vendor='Microsoft' dataSource.category='security' actor.user.email_addr=* | group count() by geo_ip_country(device.ip)
graphs.title: User Logons by Country

graphs.query: dataSource.vendor='Microsoft' dataSource.category='security' event.type contains 'Failed' | group count() by actor.user.email_addr
graphs.title: Failed Logons by User

graphs.query: dataSource.vendor='Microsoft' dataSource.category='security' activity_name='Logon' | group count() by timestamp=timebucket('1h')
graphs.title: User Logon Frequency

graphs.query: dataSource.vendor='Microsoft' dataSource.category='security' activity_name='UserLoginFailed' | group count() by timestamp=timebucket('1h')
graphs.title: Failed Logon Frequency
